description: The trap is sent whenever the port state enter the
Partion mode when more than 61 collisions occur while
trasmitting.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ES1200-MIB::swEventPortPartition ES1200-MIB::swL2PortInfoUnitIndex i 9999 ES1200-MIB::swL2PortInfoModuleIndex i 9999 ES1200-MIB::swL2PortInfoIndex i 9999

description: Indicates ID of the module on the unit
variables.name: ES1200-MIB::swL2PortInfoModuleIndex

description: Indicates ID of the port on the module
variables.name: ES1200-MIB::swL2PortInfoIndex

description: The trap is sent whenever the link state of a port changes
from link up to link down or from link down to link up

description: The trap indicates that broadcast higher rising threshold
. This trap including the port ID

event.Summary: Broadcast traffic on port $v3 exceeded higher rising threshold

. This trap including the port ID

event.Summary: Broadcast traffic on port $v3 dropped below higher falling threshold
